The UN has decided to send an additional 2000 troops to bolster its force in Ivory Coast, citing deep concern over the continuing violence and human rights violations. The news comes as a fifth round of mediation talks collapsed. Alassane Ouattara is considered to have won the vote but incumbent President Laurent Gbagbo is refusing to step down. Spy''/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said.`` It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body.''
